title: Ayurvedic Oils for Radiant Skin: Amla & Rosehip Combo
author: Harish
excerpt: Combining amla and rosehip oil offers antioxidant, regenerative support for the skin—learn how to layer, when to use, and dosha notes.
content:
Why Amla and Rosehip Make a Great Night Serum

Amla provides antioxidant Rasayana benefits and cooling energetics, while rosehip oil is rich in essential fatty acids and supports skin renewal. Together they work overnight to support repair and glow.

How to Use in Your Routine

  1. Cleanse and tone.
  2. Apply 2–3 drops of serum and massage gently.
  3. Layer a light moisturizer if needed.
  4. Use nightly for best results.

Dosha Notes

  • Pitta: This cooling, antioxidant serum is highly suitable.
  • Vata: Pair with a richer oil in very dry seasons.
  • Kapha: Use sparingly to avoid excess oiliness.

Patch Test & Precautions

Always patch-test botanical serums before full-face use. If you have acne-prone skin, introduce slowly and consult your dermatologist if breakouts occur.

Shop Amla & Rosehip Serum and nurture nightly renewal the Ayurvedic way.
